dmca.title: [EV1-C1802155V] DMCA Notification - ISP Letter - turbocharger-parts.com/Autometer

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net]

turbocharger-parts.com/Autometer

at Monday, Nov 13 2006 04:27 pm

Subject: DMCA Notification - ISP Letter - turbocharger-parts.com/Autometer
Date: Mon, 13 Nov 2006 17:27:11 -0500
Message-ID: <D86F07BB66395C43A311B078855B2B5AABB586@ms17.mse9.exchange.ms>
X-MS-Has-Attach: yes
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:  
Thread-Topic: DMCA Notification - ISP Letter - turbocharger-parts.com/Autometer
Thread-Index: AccHctgNe263IyvpSiypW9RKR6oMaQ==
From: "Victor Tarver" <vtarver@netenforcers.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, 
        <copyright@theplanet.com>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Nov 2006 22:27:28.0091 (UTC) FILETIME=[E6A9EAB0:01C70772] 

 (multipart/related)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
The Planet, 
 
  
 
Please read carefully.  The infringing website, turbocharger-parts.com, has been
sent a separate cease and desist letter via certified postal mail and should be
receiving it shortly.  Thank you. 
 
  
 
  
 
Victor Tarver 
 
LMS Representative 
 
Net Enforcers Inc. 
 
VTarver@netenforcers.com  
 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com  
 
  
 
The Online Enforcement Specialists...... 
 
Statement of Confidentiality 
 
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. 
 
  
 
  
 
                                                                                                                                       
 
11/14/2006 
 
7005 1160 0002 6996 0765 
 
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL 
 
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
 
Designated Agent 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
 
George Poletes 
 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 
 
Dallas TX 75207 
 
  
 
  
 
Re:  Unauthorized Use of CLIENT'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
This office is authorized to act on behalf of Autometer in this matter. 
 
This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Auto Meter Products Inc. ("Auto Meter")
(such copyrighted material is referred to as "Auto Meter Works") by your client,
turbocharger-parts.com, at the URL www.turbocharger-parts.com.  Auto Meter has a
good faith belief that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not
authorized by Auto Meter, its agents, or the law.  The information contained in this
letter is accurate, and under the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to
act on behalf of Auto Meter. 
 
  
 
The specific works, graphics or other material Auto Meter believes to be infringed
or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are
copyrighted images from Auto Meter's website.  Specific violations of copyrighted
images by turbocharger-parts.com are listed below this paragraph. 
 
  
 
http://www.turbocharger-parts.com/details.php?products_id=86 
 
http://www.turbocharger-parts.com/details.php?products_id=95&osCsid=ab21698a6d7e7a7575c616eeab3677fb

 
http://www.turbocharger-parts.com/details.php?products_id=100&osCsid=ab21698a6d7e7a7575c616eeab3677fb

 
http://www.turbocharger-parts.com/details.php?products_id=102&osCsid=ab21698a6d7e7a7575c616eeab3677fb

 
http://www.turbocharger-parts.com/details.php?products_id=97&osCsid=ab21698a6d7e7a7575c616eeab3677fb

 
  
 
There are various additional locations of infringement on www.turbocharger-parts.com
website.  The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all
infringements need to be addressed. 
 
  
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Auto Meter
hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this case.  Calls directly to Auto Meter will not be accepted. 
If Infringer does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on
11/24/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and will proceed
accordingly. 
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
VCLM Law 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc
